channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Spotify : une partie des 300 To de musique « volée » est disponible au téléchargement
item.description: Le catalogue musical de Spotify « sauvegardé » par le collectif Anna’s Archive en décembre dernier a en partie été mis à disposition au téléchargement sur la Toile.

item.title: I’ve spent two months testing the Oura Ring 3 and it’s genuinely still one of the best ways to gain insight into your night’s sleep – especially thanks to this price cut
item.description: After using it to track my sleep for months, I’m happy to say the Oura Ring 3’s sleep tracking still holds up – and that it’s been slashed down to this bargain price.

item.title: Don't buy the Apple Watch SE 3 this Presidents' Day – I'd get this objectively better Apple Watch instead, as it's 25% off
item.description: Valentine's Day is the perfect time to think about caring for your heart – and the ticker-tracking Apple Watch Series 11 is 25% off right now.

item.title: HP's Omen Max 16 laptop with Core Ultra 9, RTX 5080 and 32GB DDR5 is a video editing powerhouse - and it's got a huge $1300 saving for Presidents' Day
item.description: HP’s 16-inch Omen Max laptop comes with an Intel Core Ultra 9 processor, 32GB RAM, and a 1TB SSD, and it’s currently on sale for Presidents Day with a huge 39% discount.

item.title: Le PDG de Binance France victime d’une tentative d’agression à son domicile
item.description: Trois hommes cagoulés et armés ont tenté de s'en prendre à David Princay, le responsable de Binance France, dans le Val-de-Marne. Après avoir fouillé son appartement vide, le trio s'est lancé à la recherche d'un second entrepreneur.

item.title: This Retro ‘Wonder Man’ Trailer Is So Fun, We Wish It Was a Real Movie
item.description: On the heels of Marvel's series starring Yahya Abdul-Mateen II and Ben Kingsley, the studio has unearthed a special treat 'from the archives.'

item.title: Are Waterproof Sneakers Worth It? (2026)
item.description: The idea of having warm, dry feet on your wet, snowy run is appealing. But you might not like the trade-offs.

item.title: The hottest indie game is about breeding cats with ADHD and dyslexia
item.description: When the Mewgenics team announced in 2024 that it had added autism to the list of disorders the game's cats could inherit, developer Edmund McMillen - best known as the co-creator of Super Meat Boy - was unprepared for the reaction. "It was like the most positive response I've ever had to anything I posted," […]

item.title: HP’s laptop subscriptions are a great deal — for HP
item.description: There's been some hullabaloo over HP's laptop subscription service, recently brought to light by a Linus Tech Tips video. And for good reason: it feels like everything is a subscription these days. But it's not just the dystopian feeling that companies are happy to sell you access to movies, music, games, phones, printers, and now […]

item.title: Monster Hunter Stories 3 offers a dream sandbox to catch, train, and grow your team of monsters – but I just can't vibe with it
item.description: After a few hours with the game's opening chapters, I've found Monster Hunter Stories 3 has a lot to offer fans of the series who want to dig into a massive monster-growing and monster-battling sandbox, if you can gel with some of the repetition and its often grating tone.

item.title: Meta really wants you to believe social media addiction is 'not a real thing'
item.description: Meta went to court this week in two major trials over alleged harms facilitated by its platform. In New Mexico, the state's attorney general has accused the company of facilitating child exploitation and harming children through addictive features. In a separate case in Los Angeles, a California woman sued the company over mental health harms she says she suffered as the result of addictive design choices from Meta and others.In both cases, Meta has disputed the idea that social media should be considered an "addiction." On the stand this week, Instagram chief Adam Mosseri said that social med...

item.title: Why does my VPN keep disconnecting?
item.description: One good thing about virtual private networks (VPNs) is that when they don't work, the problem is almost always solvable without technical training. Although it's aggravating when your VPN randomly drops your connection, the chances are good that you can handle the issue yourself without getting tech support involved.If your VPN is repeatedly disconnecting from the server, I recommend dealing with the problem immediately. When you have your kill switch on as good cybersecurity habits dictate, VPN drops will kick you off the internet. Without that feature enabled, it'll expose your real identit...

item.title: I used the Dynabook Tecra A65-M 16-inch business laptop for a week, and the display is its weak link
item.description: A powerful business-focused 16-inch laptop that provides plenty of direct connectivity options, making it ideal for use both in the office and out in the field.

item.title: Ring cuts ties with controversial police tech company after 'dystopian' Super Bowl ad sparks a huge backlash
item.description: Ring has terminated its partnership with Flock Safety, as debates rage about user privacy and law enforcement access.

item.title: DoorDashers are getting paid to close Waymo's self-driving car doors
item.description: A few days ago, a Redditor posted in the community for DoorDash drivers that they received an offer to close a Waymo vehicle’s door. The job paid a guaranteed fee of $6.25 with a $5 extra on top of it after the DoorDasher verifies that it has been completed. Waymo has confirmed to 404Media and TechCrunch that, yes, it is indeed paying Dashers to shut the doors of its self-driving cars. And it makes sense because, well, there’s nobody to do it otherwise if a passenger accidentally leaves it open. The Alphabet subsidiary and DoorDash told the publications that it’s currently running a pilot prog...

item.title: The Morning After: Meta turned Threads algorithm complaints into an official feature
item.description: Threads users have complained about its recommendation algorithm since the dawn of time 2023. Users even started writing posts addressed to the algorithm, specifying the topics they wanted to see more of. Now, that’s part of the system: Users can write a post that begins with “dear algo” to adjust their preferences, officially.For example, you could write: “Dear algo, show me more posts about sous vide recipes.” You can also ask to see fewer posts about topics you don’t want to see, like “Dear algo, stop showing me posts about air fryers.” You can even retweet other users’ “dear algo” posts to...

item.title: Steam : comment la plateforme va vous aider à savoir si un jeu tournera sur VOTRE PC
item.description: Steam va permettre aux joueurs de joindre les caractéristiques techniques de leur PC à leur avis laissé sur un jeu. Une information très utile pour juger de l'optimisation d'un titre.

item.title: Après 8 mois de silence, Microsoft règle discrètement le pire bug de Windows 11 contre Chrome
item.description: Un fâcheux bug dans Windows 11 empêchait certains utilisateurs d'utiliser ou même de lancer le navigateur Google Chrome. Microsoft vient de déployer un correctif pour son système de contrôle parental, le coupable de ce dysfonctionnement.

item.title: Popeyes is losing the chicken sandwich wars. Its comeback plan starts with low-performing locations
item.description: Facing new rivals and weak performance, the fast food chain’s parent company has outlined a multi-pronged plan to support franchisees and revive the brand. Once the king of the chicken sandwich, Popeyes faces a lot of competition for the crown these days.

item.title: Shure MV88 USB-C : le micro stéréo USB-C pensé pour les créateurs mobiles
item.description: Annoncé au CES 2026, le microphone Shure MV88 USB-C est désormais une réalité. Il s’adresse aux créateurs de contenus mobiles qui souhaitent réaliser des enregistrements audio de niveau professionnel, sans installation complexe, grâce à une connexion directe en USB‑C et des traitements intégrés automatisés.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 : voici une ancienne référence qui vaut encore le détour, surtout quand elle est 240 € moins chère qu’à sa sortie
item.description: Certes, la Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 n'est pas la plus récente des montres connectées du géant sud-coréen. Mais désormais, même celles et ceux qui ont un budget très serré peuvent se l'offrir : Cdiscount la propose en effet à 109 euros au lieu de 349 euros.

item.title: Advertising made the internet accessible. Will it do the same for AI?
item.description: Is advertising the only viable way to fund AI at scale? Will it quietly dictate what these systems optimize for? Advertising in generative AI systems has become a fault line. Last month, OpenAI released that it would start running ads in ChatGPT. Speaking at the World Economic Forum in Davos, OpenAI’s chief financial officer defended the introduction of ads inside ChatGPT, arguing that it is a way to “democratize access to artificial intelligence,” and that this decision is aligned with its mission: “AGI for the benefit of humanity, not for the benefit of humanity who can pay.”...

item.title: Enedis pourrait réduire la puissance des compteurs Linky à distance pour éviter les coupures
item.description: Plutôt qu'une coupure électrique totale, les pouvoirs publics et Enedis étudient une nouvelle arme : utiliser le compteur Linky pour brider temporairement à distance la puissance des foyers. Une solution de dernier recours qui permet de garder l'essentiel allumé au lieu de vous plonger dans le noir.

item.title: Google Photos s’offre un nouveau look, mais uniquement sur iPhone et iPad

item.title: Mauvaise surprise pour l’arrivée du Rivian R2 électrique en Europe ? Ce petit changement sème le doute
item.description: À quelques jours de son lancement aux USA, le Rivian R2, voiture électrique cruciale pour l'avenir de la marque, semble prendre ses distances avec l'Europe : initialement prévu en 2027, plus aucune date d'arrivée sur nos marchés n'est communiquée.

item.title: T-Mobile is giving away the iPhone 17 for free when you add a new line and trade in
item.description: As of Feb. 13, you can get a free iPhone 17 from T-Mobile when you add a new line on a qualifying plan and trade in an eligible old phone.

item.title: « J’en ai fini de travailler avec des connards », Jony Ive cartonne Apple
item.description: Interviewé récemment dans le cadre de sa collaboration avec Ferrari, le designer industriel Jony Ive, ancien maître à penser d'Apple pour la conception de certains de ses produits les plus iconiques, s'en est pris indirectement à ses anciens collègues, les traitant littéralement... de « connards ».

item.description: Silent Hill: Townfall is set in a creepy little Scottish town that leans heavily into analog tech and medical horror.

item.description: Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots is coming to modern systems in a new Master Collection.

item.title: Ecovacs Winbot Mini 2 : le petit robot qui mise tout sur l’agilité
item.description: Après le colossal Winbot W3 Omni présenté au CES, Ecovacs présente un nouveau laveur de vitres qui revient aux essentiels. Point de station multifonction ici : le Winbot Mini 2 se veut le robot lave-vitre le plus compact du marché, capable de se faufiler là où d'autres doivent jeter l'éponge.

item.title: Microsoft n’en peut plus d’OpenAI : on connait les raisons du divorce
item.description: Microsoft souhaite désormais voler de ses propres ailes et vise une « véritable autonomie » en matière d'IA pour réduire sa dépendance à OpenAI.

item.title: The 'QuitGPT' movement is targeting ChatGPT with a boycott and spotlighting the politics behind the AI giant
item.description: QuitGPT is a viral grassroots campaign encouraging users to cancel ChatGPT over political and ethical concerns, highlighting rising tensions between AI platforms and their users.
